name: nefol-monorepo
description: Nefol monorepo: user-panel, admin-panel, backend, common

scripts.dev: concurrently -n user,admin,api -c blue,magenta,green "pnpm --filter user-panel dev" "pnpm --filter admin-panel dev" "pnpm --filter backend dev"
scripts.build:all: pnpm --filter user-panel build && pnpm --filter admin-panel build && pnpm --filter backend build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter user-panel clean && pnpm --filter admin-panel clean && pnpm --filter backend clean
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter user-panel lint && pnpm --filter admin-panel lint && pnpm --filter backend lint
scripts.test: pnpm --filter user-panel test && pnpm --filter admin-panel test && pnpm --filter backend test
